select FROM b_books WHERE deleted_flag = 0 and b_books.ID=#{id}

order by b_books.created_date desc limit #{start},#{size}

mapper.update:
update b_books
book_name = #{bookName},
book_img_url = #{bookImgUrl},
book_version = #{bookVersion},
book_issn = #{bookIssn},
book_isbn = #{bookIsbn},
book_asin = #{bookAsin},
book_author = #{bookAuthor},
book_desc = #{bookDesc},
book_price = #{bookPrice},
book_press = #{bookPress},
book_url = #{bookUrl},
book_src = #{bookSrc},
price = #{price},
version = version + 1, updated_date = current_timestamp(), updated_by=#{updatedBy}
where b_books.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update b_books set deleted_flag = 1 where b_books.id = #{id}
